item.description:
If you have been curious about Pilates or would like to get in better shape but not sure where to begin, this is the class for you.


Pilates works the whole body, emphasizing control, precision and concentration in both the mind and the body. The focus of the movements is on quality not quantity.
The abdominal muscles lower back and buttocks (“powerhouse”) serve as the center of all movement, allowing the rest of the body to move freely. Its six principles-concentration, control, centering, breathing, flow and precision-train the body to move efficiently.


The balance between strength and flexibility creates a healthy, symmetrical workout for all muscle groups resulting in a leaner, more balanced, and stronger body.


This class is limited to six people & is perfect for the beginner. All exercises are modified so that everyone, regardless of limitations, can get a good workout.

Class is Saturday Jan 5th at 11:30am in Wakefield & offered at a special reduced rate of $10. (Special offer - 4 more beginner classes for only $40 if you pay that day)

Register by emailing Connie at bodybyconnie@gmail.com
